root.name: Mahou Kishi Rayearth 2: Making of Magic Knight
root.description: OverviewMahou Kishi Rayearth 2: Making of Magic Knight is a game in the Magic Knight Rayearth series and was published by Sega on the Game Gear.GameplayMahou Kishi Rayearth 2: Making of Magic Knight is a different game than the other Magic Knight Rayearth games, despite being titled as a sequel. While the other games are RPG games, this game is a strategy/breeding style game.The players job is to train Hikaru, Fuu, and Umi to ultimately become Magic Knights.The game is mostly menu driven with various activities in the game not being directly controllable.
